alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 1:31PM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snowfall of 10 to 14 inches in the mountains, especially west-facing slopes. New snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches over South Pass. Winds gusting 40 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains, Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief lull in snowfall is expected Wednesday afternoon. The second round arrives Wednesday evening, with moderate to heavy snowfall into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
